document.full_text: baseball star jason giambi, testifying at home run king barry bonds' perjury trial, said on tuesday that he used illegal anabolic steroids obtained from bonds' personal trainer.
document.title: barry bonds' fellow star giambi details steroid use
lines_and_colors: baseball star jason giambi, testifying at home run king barry bonds' perjury trial, said on tuesday that he used illegal anabolic steroids obtained from bonds' personal trainer.
